name: Kakti - Free
description:
GAMEPLAY - Catch balloons with the cactus.

CONTROL - The movement is made with the inclination of the device in the appropriate direction.
GRAFIK - Hand drawn, comic look
FÜR KINDER - Nonviolent fun for children
FEATURES - Various balloons, bonus balloons
HIGHSCORE - Worldwide comparison with all players
NO HIDDEN COSTS - No In-App purchases
